tool.name: Extract Cell Info
tool.description: Creates a table with entries for each cell.

param.name: input_image_path
param.label: Optional: Enter path to images to be analyzed.
param.help: Leave blank to get from AlignedImages folder in the Galaxy output folder, or enter path to images to be analyzed, e.g. /finkbeiner/imaging/smb-robodata/your_folders/AlignedImages

param.name: output_results_path
param.label: Optional: Enter path to output csv file.
param.help: Leave blank to save to the Galaxy output folder, or enter another path, e.g. /finkbeiner/imaging/smb-robodata/your_folders/OverlaysTablesResults

tool.help: Generates a table for further analysis.
